text: Ðys synd þa londgemære into wylleres ege.
Ærest of þere ege on sondbroc.
Onlong weiges on norð bommes broc.
Up onlong broces on þa ealdan dic.
Of badsetena gemære on tunwealdes stan.
Of tunewealdes stane on wudanhammes broc.
Of burhwellan on ða burhwalles of þam burhwallan onbutan eadulfing garan.
And þer onlong stræt<../images/tbar.gif>on suðwardne þone burhwal, and westwardne.
<../images/tbar.gif>on ge rihte a be ðan heafdan<../images/tbar.gif>æft on wylleres eige.
